title: Input schema of the Roblox Experience Stats scraper

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Experience/game pages or listing pages to start crawling from (e.g. https://www.roblox.com/games/<placeId>/<name>).

experienceIds.title: Experience / Place IDs
experienceIds.description: Optional numeric place IDs to directly fetch stats for (preferred for API mode).

useApi.title: Use Roblox API endpoints where available
useApi.description: If true, attempt to use Roblox public endpoints (faster and more reliable). If false, fall back to HTML scraping or Playwright.

useBrowser.title: Use Playwright (render JS)
useBrowser.description: If true, use PlaywrightCrawler to render pages and capture dynamic player counts. Slower but sometimes required.

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests that can be made by this crawler.

followInternalOnly.title: Follow internal links only
followInternalOnly.description: If true, keep crawling within roblox.com or the same host as start URL.

checkPlaceDetails.title: Fetch place details (extra API calls)
checkPlaceDetails.description: If true, make additional calls to place/details endpoints (may increase request count).

concurrency.title: Concurrency
concurrency.description: Number of parallel requests (CheerioCrawler). Lower for politeness.
